title: (x) Number 7 on Vegas slot machines - various alternatives {Stephen}
content:
Can anyone please tell me the name of the font that the "7" on a Vegas slot machine is from? I would also like to know where I can download the font if anyone knows where... Here is an example of what the numbers look like that I am looking for at this link [http://www.dafont.com/lucky-ape.font](http://web.archive.org/web/20150302015927/http:/www.dafont.com/lucky-ape.font "http://www.dafont.com/lucky-ape.font") I believe the font I am looking for is similar to the font used for the big number "5" in the corner of a five dollar bill. Anyway, I would greatly appreciate it if someone could help me out. I've looked for this font all over the internet but, because I don't know the actual name of the font, I can't find it anywhere!!!!

Thanks,

Matt
author: Filmkid2003

comments.content:
I imagine a variety of lettering styles are used on slot machines. Here are some ideas:

[Carousel](http://web.archive.org/web/20150302015927/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=EF.6730.0.0&attributes.sampleSize=144&sampleText=7&sampleSize=388)  
 [57 Rodeo](http://web.archive.org/web/20150302015927/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=BL.122748.0.0&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=7&sampleSize=388)  
 [Madrone](http://web.archive.org/web/20150302015927/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=M.124649.0.0&attributes.sampleSize=288&sampleText=7&sampleSize=200)  
 [Spumoni](http://web.archive.org/web/20150302015927/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=LP.9497.0.0&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=7&sampleSize=388)  
 [Depot](http://web.archive.org/web/20150302015927/http:/typography.com/catalog/numbers/more4.html)  
 [Quentin](http://web.archive.org/web/20150302015927/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=EF.101059.0.0&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=7&sampleSize=388)  
 [Zebrawood](http://web.archive.org/web/20150302015927/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=C.8037.3.6&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=7&sampleSize=388)  
 [Rosewood](http://web.archive.org/web/20150302015927/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=M.125230.0.0&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=7&sampleSize=388)  
 [ITC Buckeroo](http://web.archive.org/web/20150302015927/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=C.100302.0.0&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=7&sampleSize=388)  
 [Egyptian Extended Bold](http://web.archive.org/)

Thanks Stephen. I think the "Carousel" font is closest to the font that I'm looking for. I posted a new topic with a picture of the slot machine "7" I'm looking for. Have you seen that particular font anywhere?

House LV Nugget is in the ballpark -

[http://www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=27&subpage=viewfontsp...](http://web.archive.org/web/20150302015927/http:/www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=27&subpage=viewfontspecimens "http://www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=27&subpage=viewfontspecimens")

More Vegas fonts - [http://www.fontdiner.com/menu\_vegas.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20150302015927/http:/www.fontdiner.com/menu_vegas.html "http://www.fontdiner.com/menu\_vegas.html")
